OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive BMS-247550 IV 3 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive 2 additional course beyond CR . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year every 6 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 25-45 patient accrue study within 5-9 month .
